definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

pinyin: zheng4 zhi4 yi4 yi4 ren2 shi4
xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1 ren2 shi4

sentences.english: According to informed sources, "the Deputy Editor-in-Chief" is an administrative level.
sentences.chinese: 據知情人士說，“副總編輯”是一個行政級別。

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我們誠聘充滿活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表處。

sentences.english: Or, at least some prominent figures think so.
sentences.chinese: 至少某些知名人士是這樣認爲的。

sentences.english: Donation of 550 wheelchairs at Qinyang, Henan on May 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 天鄰基金會捐贈550張輪椅河南省沁陽市殘疾人士。

sentences.english: The SafeHouse is a place for people of different faiths to share and support each other.
sentences.chinese: 是一個讓來自不同信仰的人士分享及互相支持的天地。

sentences.english: He's a pre-eminent authority in the field of bio-chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 他是生化學這個領域最傑出的權威人士。

sentences.english: Most analysts assumed that Inouye would liquidate the company.
sentences.chinese: 大部分分析人士認爲Inouye將清算公司。

sentences.english: Splint keeps big toe aligned and held in place with Velcro. Best for people with hallux valgus.
sentences.chinese: 固定拇趾於正確位置，適合拇趾外翻人士使用。

sentences.english: And the industry says the data are used harmlessly.
sentences.chinese: 而行業人士聲稱數據是無害使用的。

sentences.english: This is a common strategy among pros who have a lot of experience and iron discipline.
sentences.chinese: 這是有經驗，有鐵的紀律的專業人士常用的策略。

sentences.english: Protesters also clashed with security in the troubled city of Port Said.
sentences.chinese: 抗議人士還在塞得港和警方發生衝突。

sentences.english: Slice like a pro without risking a cut.
sentences.chinese: 像專業人士那樣切片也不用擔心割傷。

sentences.english: Candidates may be required to produce medical proof of their disability.
sentences.chinese: 申請人或須提交醫生證明書，以證明他爲殘疾人士。

sentences.english: If the self-employed person succeeds in business, he has the chance to earn a great deal of money.
sentences.chinese: 如果自僱人士的商業成功，他有機會賺很多錢。

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血壓及胃酸過多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期間禁用。

sentences.english: Moderates have displaced the extremists on the committee.
sentences.chinese: 在委員會中，穩健派人士取代了激進派人士。

definition: all walks of life/all social circles
executive/senior management/(contraction of 高級管理|高级管理)
all parties (in a dispute etc)/all sides/all directions

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
